description:
While Kirishima is dealing with the men on his tail and meets a certain individual, Yoshino must handle things alone with Naoya.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: En vrai, je veux t`épouser (2e partie)
Honne o Ieba Kekkon Shitai: Chuuhen
To Be Honest, I Want to Marry You, Part Two
本音を言えば結婚したい 中編
